attributes.action: compensate to all public houses (PUB’) as it was advisory to stay away from them
attributes.additional_details: It is advisory to keep out of public house’s (PUB’s). Landlords that battle all year around to stop anti social behaviour, drugs, violence should be compensated because the general public are advised to stay away from their tax paying business. We should
attributes.background: It is advisory to keep out of public house’s (PUB’s). Landlords that battle all year around to stop anti social behaviour, drugs, violence should be compensated because the general public are advised to stay away from their tax paying business. We should

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government has announced that pubs, clubs and restaurants are to close. It has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

If you want the UK Government to give economic assistance to the hospitality industry, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302162

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
